name: General
title: Written Budget
text:
If You Haven  Set Up A Budget For Yourself,
Now Is The Time To Do So!
A Little Goes A Long Way. Writing A Budget Helps You Measure Your Progress And Keep A Record

name: General
title: Pay On Time
text:
How Many Times Have You Been Just A Few Hours Late On A Credit Card Payment And Kissed $40 Goodbye? 
Just Three Late Payments A Year Could Cost More Than $100!
Delay On Payments Affects Your Credit Score! Pay All Dues On Time!

name: Electricity Bill
title: Efficient Lighting
text:
Energy Efficient Light Bulbs
Reduces The Bill, Lasts Longer
Victorian Government Initiative:
Https://Www.Esc.Vic.Gov.Au/Victorian-Energy-Upgrades/About-Victorian-Energy-Upgrades-Program

name: Electricity Bill
title: Cold Wash
text:
Perform All Machine Washes With Cold Water
Higher The Water Temperature, Higher The Bill
Look At Eco Settings, Load Size Settings For Efficient Power Usage

name: Electricity Bill
title: Switches
text:
Switch Off All Lights And Appliances At The Wall
Tvs, Microwaves, Dishwashers And Phone Chargers Consume Electricity Even In Standby Mode
Smart Power Board Can Be Used To Optimize Usage

name: Electricity Bill
title: Insulation
text:
Insulate Your Home - Cost Effective
Reduces Cooling/Heating Costs - Helps Maintain A Comfortable Natural Temperature
As Per Victorian Government, Savings Can Be Up To 40-50% Per Year

name: Electricity Bill
title: Electricity Providers
text:
Compare Electricity Providers
Look For Prices As Well As Customer Satisfaction Review
Monitor For Better Deals And Offers

name: Water Bill
title: Cold Water Storage
text:
Store Cold Water In The Fridge
Keep Enough Bottles For The Whole Day
On Hot Days, This Will Save Water, Instead Of Opening The Tap And Letting The Water Flow Till It Is Cold!

name: Water Bill
title: Showers
text:
Take Shorter Showers
By Reducing The Time You Shower By Just Four Minutes, You Can Save Almost 4,000 Gallons Of Water Per Year, Equivalent To $100 Per Year
Installing A Low-Flow Shower Head Can Reduce The Amount Of Water You Use While Showering By As Much As 50%, Saving You As Much On Bills

name: Water Bill
title: Running Water
text:
Turn Off All Unused Taps / Faucets
Don'T Let The Water Run When Shaving Or Brushing Your Teeth
Use Cups Filled With Tap Water Wherever Possible, Rather Than Letting The Water Run

name: Water Bill
title: Washing
text:
Run Full Loads Of Dishes In The Dishwasher
Run A Full Load In The Washing Machine
Saves Water As Well As The Number Of Times The Machine Has To Run

name: Gas Bill
title: Gas Bill Tips
text:
Easiest And Most Effective Measure:
Turn The Thermostat Down
Bringing The Thermostat Down By 7 - 10 Degrees For Eight Hours A Day Can Reduce Your Bill By Up To 10%.

name: Groceries
title: Meal Plan
text:
Plan Your Dinners For The Week And Make A List
Diligently Perform Grocery Shopping - Missing Ingredients Will Result In Takeout
Opt For "Grocery Home Delivery

name: Groceries
title: Prepare Ahead
text:
Prepare Lunch The Night Before
Lack Of Time/Energy Will Result In Eating Poorly Or Eating Out
Preparing Ahead Can Ensure You Eat Well And In A Controlled Budget

name: Groceries
title: Drink Water
text:
Instead Of Drinking Alcohol And Soft Drinks
Switch To The Healthier And Cheaper Option
Water Tends To Be A Free Option In Most Restaurants And Stores

name: Phone Bill
title: Mobile Bill Tips
text:
Match Your Cell Phone Plan To Your Usage.
Look At Switching Service Providers.
You Can Use Your Current Phone With A Better Suited Plan.

name: Banking
title: Lower Interest Rates
text:
Been A Long-Term Loyal Customer With Your Credit Card Company?
Your Credit Card Company May Be Able To Get You Lower Intereset Rates On Your Credit Card!
There is No Official Process – Just Call Up And Ask What Can Be Done
If You Don'T Succeed, Maybe You Should Consider Changing Companies

name: Banking
title: Free Checking Account
text:
Does Your Checking Account Charge Maintenance And Annual Fees?
There is No Reason You Should Be Paying Maintenance And Annual Fees For A Checking Account
Banks Online-Only And Offer Completely Free Checking Accounts!
If So, It'is Time To Make A Switch!

name: Entertainment
title: Cable TV vs Streaming
text:
Do You Still Pay For Cable Every Month?
Cut The Cord! Streaming Is Now!
You Can Get A Roku Or Apple Tv For An Upfront Cost Of Between $25 And $70, Depending On The Model You Choose

name: Personal
title: Gym Membership
text:
Dump The Gym Membership
If You’Re Going To The Gym At Least Twice A Week, Then You’Re Probably Getting Your Money's Worth
Jogging Around The Neighborhood, Riding A Bike, Or Doing A Workout Video Are Alternatives To Staying Fit
Fitness Apps Have Access To Different Fitness Routines For Free Or Very Low Cost

name: Personal
title: Haircut
text:
Do It Yourself Or Ask A Mate!
Short Hair - Invest In A Decent Set Of Clippers (Around $20)
Long Hair - Invest In A Pair Of Scissors

name: Personal
title: Eating Out
text:
Eat Before You Go Out
Carry Snacks On You Where Possible
If You Desire To Eat Out - Share A Meal With A Mate

name: Clothing
title: Cheaper Options
text:
Buy Clothes At Consignment Or Thrift Stores
Look For Discounts And Offers!
Buy Electronics And Computer Peripherals Online - Cheaper Option

name: Clothing
title: Think Twice on Sales
text:
While Sales Do Help You Save Money, It Does Not Cost Less Than Not Buying The Item
Ask Yourself Whether You Really Need The Item Before Buying

name: Clothing
title: Online Shopping
text:
Make It Difficult To Shop Online
Try Not To Save Your Billing Information On Retailer Websites You Often Visit
Having To Input Your Address And Billing Details Make It Less Prone To Impulse Buying

name: Personal
title: Gumtree
text:
Check Gumtree For Used Furniture, Cars, And Electronics
Bargain Offers, Sometimes Free
Transation Guidelines - Meet In A Public Place, In The Daytime
Wherever Possible, Take A Mate

name: Personal
title: Smoking
text:
Smoking Drains The Wallet!
Quit Smoking - It Is Injurious To Health
Quitting Smoking Can Save You Up To $5000 A Year

name: Registration and licence
title: Car Wash
text:
Have Soap, A Bucket, And Some Old Rags?
Wash Your Car Yourself!
A Hand-Car Wash Can Save You Up To $200!

name: Registration and licence
title: Fuel Consumption
text:
Choose To Walk / Cycle Wherever Possible
Or Carpool With A Friend Or Neighbour If You Can
Not Driving 1Km To And From A Location Daily Will Save You About $2000 Every Year

name: Entertainment
title: Library
text:
Go To The Public Library Closest To You To Read Books
There Is No Need To Buy Books Or Magazines To Past The Time
There Are Plenty Of Reading Material You Can Use For Free In A Public Library

name: Entertainment
title: Festivals
text:
Volunteer At Festivals You Are Interested In!!
Cultural Festivals And Events Often Provide Free Admission To Event Volunteers
Contact The Organizers For Your Favorite Events To Find Out The Opportunities And Benefits!!
